titles: Aphorismes of justification, with their explication annexed wherein also is opened the nature of the covenants, satisfaction, righteousnesse, faith, works, &c. : published especially for the use of the church of Kederminster in Worcestershire / by their unworthy teacher Ri. Baxter.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: Separate t.p. for: An appendix to the fore-going treatise.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
